attributes.action:
. Private hire insurances 
. Introduce fare private hire and reword insurance.
attributes.additional_details: Example if you have insured 8 years in one insurer and you have 3 fault accident latest 3 years, that insurer wil say to you I can't insure you becouse you have 3 fault accidents.
attributes.background: Private hire drivers are most af the time on the road. The likelihood of accident  is very high, but their live is depending for the driving. The most private hire insurances refuse the driver if he has 3 fault accident at the latest 3 years.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on insurance companies, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
